steps.name: Introduction
steps.content: Concentrated liquidity is a new feature that allows liquidity providers (LPs) to accumulate their capital to smaller price intervals, resulting in higher capital efficiency and deeper liquidity for traders.

steps.name: Benefits for Traders and LPs
steps.content: With concentrated liquidity, traders have access to deeper liquidity around the mid-price, while LPs can earn more trading fees.

steps.name: Flexibility for LPs
steps.content: LPs have the flexibility to open as many positions in the pool as they want, creating unique price curves that align with their personal needs and preferences.

choices.content: Traders can earn more trading fees.
